original_title: La Comédie presque française : L'Ecole des naans
overview: The Almost French Comedy tackles another classic by Molière, "The School of Women". A fop as a hero, an attractive heroine and a thwarted love story: the ingredients are there, but the staging is not classic. The troupe invites spectators to a Bollywood version, based on Molière's play.
title: La Comédie presque française : L'Ecole des naans
